name: Policy Cloud Insurance, Inc.
description: Provider of a digital platform intended to offer protection against key business risks. The company's digital platform offers centralized workflow management services to access quotes from multiple carriers and helps in processing insurance applications from clients, as well as offers a connected commercial insurance marketplace, centralized quoting and digital tools to interact seamlessly, enabling insurance brokers to have access to more time and space to grow their business without focusing on internal operations.
